sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUPERFINE, in the manufactories, a term uſed to expreſs the ſuperlative fineneſs of a ſtuff : thus a cloth, a camblet, &c. are ſaid to be ſuperfine when made of the fineſt wool, &c. or when they are the fineſt that can be made.
